mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders o WHERE o.user_id=#{userId} AND o.order_status=0 AND o.deleted=false

select o.*, i.id as food_id, i.amount as amount, i.plate, f.food_name, f.image as food_image from order_item i, orders o, food f where i.deleted = false and o.deleted = false and f.deleted = false and o.id = i.order_id and i.item_id = f.id
and o.shop_id = #{shopId} and o.order_status in
#{item}
and concat(o.address,o.contact,o.phone) like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by o.id, i.plate, f.food_name
